definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: When Bush 41 talked about the economy, that was the beginning of the downward spiral.
sentences.chinese: 老布什談論經濟的時候，是經濟衰退的開始。

sentences.english: The global recession has hit Kumi's hometown hard.
sentences.chinese: 全球的經濟衰退給木村的家鄉造成了很大的衝擊。

sentences.english: Then that brings us to the 2008 recession.
sentences.chinese: 之後，那次危機導致了08年的經濟衰退。

sentences.english: THE bubble that caused a global recession has been a long time deflating.
sentences.chinese: 引發全球經濟衰退的泡沫就是長期的通貨緊縮。

sentences.english: AZUZ: The recession affected how we spend money.
sentences.chinese: 這次經濟衰退影響了我們的消費方式。

sentences.english: Many small firms did not weather the storm of the recession.
sentences.chinese: 許多小公司沒能經受住這次經濟衰退的風波。

sentences.english: That all sounds especially alluring in a recession.
sentences.chinese: 這些在如今經濟衰退時聽起來都相當誘人。

sentences.english: Mr. Greenspan also offered his take on the post-recession economy.
sentences.chinese: 格林斯潘還表達了對於後經濟衰退時期他的一些觀點。

sentences.english: The recession forced Fitzroy to sell some of his recent acquisitions.
sentences.chinese: 經濟衰退迫使菲茨羅伊出售部分最近收購的項目。

sentences.english: “And I think this downturn exacerbates” the problem, Katz told me.
sentences.chinese: 卡茨說，“我認爲經濟衰退使問題更加嚴重了。”

sentences.english: The most recent recession has increased the need to extend working life.
sentences.chinese: 最近的經濟衰退，令更多的人有延長工作年限的需求。

sentences.english: Has the Great Recession made people get cheaper haircuts?
sentences.chinese: 這次的經濟衰退是否讓人們在理髮上少花些錢呢？

sentences.english: But low interest rates in countries like Greece, Spain, and Ireland encouraged unsustainable booms or housing bubbles that, when burst, aggravated recession and budget deficits.
sentences.chinese: 一旦泡沫破裂，那麼只會加重經濟衰退和財政赤字。

sentences.english: Many home sellers remain stuck in a recessional rut.
sentences.chinese: 許多房屋的賣主仍然陷在經濟衰退的困境中。

sentences.english: The Great Recession worsened things for China. Exports fell.
sentences.chinese: 經濟衰退惡化花對中國的影響就是出口下降。

sentences.english: SAP was already under pressure from the recession and a fumbled product launch.
sentences.chinese: 此前，SAP已經在經濟衰退和產品發佈中深感壓力。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
see 每況愈下|每况愈下[mei3 kuang4 yu4 xia4]
